attributes.action: The assisted suicide bills are unlawful & cannot proceed or receive MPs votes
attributes.additional_details: Thou shall not kill - the 6th commandment attributed & legally acknowledged as law originating directly from God. Not man, woman or human, but the word of almighty God the creator. It is understood & known that this is the same force by which all law is enacted into effect & which legislation is dependent on for its divine power. Therefore all law carries the commandment because acts are with God's grace, direction and authority. Any act against the charters is void. The bills cannot proceed
attributes.background: We oppose these Bills being currently progressed through parliament because they are in contravention of the Confirmation of the Charters 1297, Liberties of the Church, Charter of Liberties & Forest. Several acts of law that confirm the Hebrew Bible and The Kings Oath to uphold the Protestant faith

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Vote against the Assisted Dying Bill
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701742
